**This has moved to Releases, please see <https://github.com/koajs/generic-session/releases>.**

2.0.0 / 2017-07-11
==================

* Refactor to koa 2 - Supports node 6.x and 7.x (#123)

1.11.6 / 2017-06-12
==================

* fix: cookie options may be changed

1.11.5 / 2017-01-16
==================

  * fix: store use options.maxAge (#112)

1.11.4 / 2016-12-01
==================

  * docs: maxage => maxAge
  * fix: maxage => maxAge (#107)
  * update default cookie maxage in readme (#84)
  * add koa-generic-session-sequelize session store (#103)

1.11.3 / 2016-07-24
==================

  * fix: always refresh session (#95)

1.11.2 / 2016-07-12
==================

  * fix: npm pack should not include test dir (#92)

1.11.1 / 2016-06-23
==================

  * fix: make sure ctx.session exists when cookie.path = '/' (#91)

1.11.0 / 2016-06-20
==================

  * Add support for overriding session save conditions per request (#89)

1.10.2 / 2016-03-23
==================

  * fix: check if session exits

1.10.1 / 2015-12-15

  * feat: ctx.session as a setter/getter

1.7.0 / 2015-03-01

  * Add support for regenerating sessions.

1.6.0 / 2015-01-16

1.4.0 / 2015-01-06
